spx.sc.net

Interface DefaultPorts


  • public interface DefaultPorts
    Default port numbers for client/server connections and heartbeats.

    These are kept in sync with the SPX_SCNET_DEFAULT_PORT_... constants in "SPxScNet.h".

    The Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) has assigned port numbers 4377 and 4378 to the Cambridge Pixel SPx Server and Display applications respectively.

    For more information, see IANA port numbers.

    The TCP ports with those numbers are used for the server connections (which perform handshaking with clients to exchange dynamically assigned data ports). One of the UDP ports is used as the default for heartbeats and the other as the default for radar distribution.

    In addition, port 5079 has been assigned for UDP use only for Cambridge Pixel SPx Reports (tracks etc.).

    See Also:
    DefaultAddresses
